article_title: Lithuanian PM Says Ukraine Crisis May Lift Euro Support
article_text:
Lithuania's prime minister said the political crisis in nearby Ukraine should give his government fodder to steer public opinion in favor of joining the euro zone in 2015.

Speaking in a phone interview Friday, Algirdas Butkevičius, said: "We need full integration into the European Union." Lithuania, like its two Baltic counterparts, has spent two decades of independence from the former Soviet Union, forging ties with the...
